channel.title: Opensource on Alex Pliutau
channel.description: Recent content in Opensource on Alex Pliutau

item.title: Go-client for PayPal API
item.description: Clients in Go There are official SDK libraries for PHP, Java and Python, but our service is written in GO, and in this case SDK search mostly fails. As a result we have found five projects on github, two of which seem worthily, but at the same time they have bounded functional: leebenson/paypal crowdmob/paypal Contribute to Open Source So we decided to make a native client in Go with 100% API coverage.
